content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: RSDRVFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0563
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when record is derived in a data collection tool and RSDRVFL
  is not equal to "Y"
Outcome:
  Message: Record is derived in a data collection tool and RSDRVFL is not equal to
    "Y"
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0563
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Used to indicate a derived record (e.g., a record
                  that represents the average of other records such as a computed
                  baseline). Should be "Y" or null.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: Section 6.3.9.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - RS

json.Description: Raise an error when record is derived in a data collection tool and RSDRVFL is not equal to "Y"

Outcome.Message: Record is derived in a data collection tool and RSDRVFL is not equal to "Y"

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Used to indicate a derived record (e.g., a record that represents the average of other records such as a computed baseline). Should be "Y" or null.
